scripts.imdb:dbcontext: dotnet ef dbcontext scaffold 'Data Source=./movie.sqlite' Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Sqlite -o ImdbContext -n Contexts --context-namespace Contexts -f
scripts.imdb:controller:title: dotnet aspnet-codegenerator controller -name TitleController -dc Contexts.MovieContext -m Contexts.Title -async -api -outDir Controllers -sqlite -f
scripts.imdb:controller: dotnet aspnet-codegenerator controller -name RatingController -dc vue_dotnet.ImdbContext.ImdbContext -m vue_dotnet.ImdbContext.Rating
scripts.update-controller: dotnet aspnet-codegenerator controller -name MyDatabaseController -dc vue_dotnet.MyDbContext.MyTableContext -m vue_dotnet.MyDbContext.MyTable -async -api -outDir Controllers -sqlite -f
scripts.update-page: dotnet aspnet-codegenerator razorpage -m vue_dotnet.MyDbContext.MyTable -dc vue_dotnet.MyDbContext.MyTableContext -udl -outDir Pages/MyDatabase --referenceScriptLibraries -sqlite
